localResource.name: Data_Centers
localResource.label: Data_Centers
localResource.queryString: Select distinct datacenter_id, delete_date, CASE WHEN delete_date IS NULL THEN datacenter_name ELSE datacenter_name || ' (Removed on ' || cast(delete_date as varchar) || ')' END as combo_name from v3_0_datacenter_configuration_view WHERE (datacenter_id in (SELECT DISTINCT datacenter_id FROM v3_0_cluster_configuration_view WHERE cluster_id in (SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id FROM v3_0_host_configuration_view)) OR datacenter_id in (SELECT DISTINCT datacenter_id FROM v3_0_datacenter_storage_domain_map_view)) AND history_id in (SELECT max(a.history_id) FROM v3_0_datacenter_configuration_view a GROUP BY a.datacenter_id) $P!{Active_VMs} UNION ALL SELECT distinct cast('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' as uuid), cast(null as timestamp), 'Non Available' WHERE NOT EXISTS (Select distinct datacenter_id from v3_0_datacenter_configuration_view WHERE (datacenter_id in (SELECT DISTINCT datacenter_id FROM v3_0_cluster_configuration_view WHERE cluster_id in (SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id FROM v3_0_host_configuration_view)) OR datacenter_id in (SELECT DISTINCT datacenter_id FROM v3_0_datacenter_storage_domain_map_view)) AND history_id in (SELECT max(a.history_id) FROM v3_0_datacenter_configuration_view a GROUP BY a.datacenter_id) $P!{Active_VMs}) order by delete_date DESC, combo_name
